src_original: eṣāṃ ca saṃyutāvartiḥ sarvagrahapramocanī /  sarvabhūtavikāreṣu eṣā netrāñjanī smṛtāḥ //  gṛhītā yena mucyanti bhūtavajraśanīśaraiḥ /
tgt_original: evāṁ ca saṁyutāvartiḥ sarvagraha pramocanī |  sarvabhūtāvikāreṣu evā netrāñjane smṛtā ||

src_original: yo hi paśyati tat sthānaṃ bhūtebhyo na bhayaṃ tataḥ /  sthānaṃ na tatra bhūtānāṃ nānyeṣām ahitaiṣiṇām //
tgt_original: yohī paśyati tatsthānaṁ bhūtebhyo nabhayaṁ tataḥ |  sthānaṁ na tatra bhūtānāṁ nānyevāahitaiṣiṇāṁm ||

src_original: bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgāni paṇavāṃś cāpi lepayet /  yāvac chrūyati śabdo 'dya trasante bhūtamaṇḍalāḥ //
tgt_original: bherīśaṁkhamṛdaṁgāśca paṇavāṁścāpi lepayet |  yāvacchyatiḥśadvasya trasyante bhūtamaṇḍalāḥ ||

src_original: yatrāsau vrajate pakṣī diśaṃ cāpi digantaram //
sthānaṃ na tatra bhūtānāṃ nānyeṣām ahitaiṣiṇām /
samantād yojanaṃ tatra svasti śāntir bhaviṣyati /
